name: Coorsha
content: Coorsha was a Rodian male pirate who lived during the Yuuzhan Vong War. Coorsha commanded a ragtag squadron of CloakShape fighters, I-7 Howlrunners and Z-95 Headhunters, which he used to raid regions of space near to the Kathol sector. At some point, he captured an Ton-Falk-class escort carrier, which he re-named Coorsha's Cross.
